items.text: leans into the length ball this time and pushes it to long on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: he closes the face of the bat to clip it to leg but the ball holds its line a bit to take a thick outside edge and run towards third man
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, 2 runs

items.text: pretty full around leg, swept away behind square for a quick one
to full, and that's right in Guptill's arc to smash it back over the bowler's head with a lot of power for a four
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Guptill, FOUR runs

items.text: touch slower and he defends it into the covers
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Guptill, no run

items.text: waits for this one to turn and he steers it towards point for a single
not much turn and Williamson goes on the back foot to steer that to deep cover
the wrong'un turns in a bit, no trouble as Guptill picks it and punches it in the covers
thick outside edge as Guptill drives and the ball goes behind square on off
pushes this length ball back towards the bowler
bit too short and it's tucked straight to midwicket
uses the high backlight to drive that down to long-on for one more
goes back to cover the stumps and then uses his wrists to work it to leg with the spin
bit slower in the air and Guptill pushes it back
thick edge hits Williamson's foot as he punches the short of length ball off the back foot
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williamson, no run

items.text: covers the stumps this time to block with a straight bat
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williamson, no run

items.text: just outside off and he pushes it down to mid-off
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williamson, no run

items.text: walks towards the line of the ball outside off and defends it off the middle on off
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williamson, no run

items.text: covers the stumps again and drives the ball back to the bowler with a straight bat
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williamson, no run

items.text: nipping in sharply this time and Williamson uses the angle to help it to fine leg
helps the ball with the turn to long-on easily

short and flat on the stumps, Guptill moves across early and paddle-sweeps it fine, Mustafizur goes for the chase and tries to slide and stop with his ankle but can't. Thankfully he didn't hurt his ankle there
uses the wrists to work this one to leg off middle and leg
slower in the air around off, Williamson waits and defends carefully

loud appeal for lbw as that keeps really low and hit him right in front of the stumps. Umpire doesn't call it out so Bangladesh review immediately . It was short so Williamson went back and opened up to swat it on the leg side but the ball didn't bounce much and struck the front pad right in front, ball-tracking says it would have hit leg stump

dismissal.text: KS Williamson lbw b Mahmudullah 11 (25m 22b 1x4 0x6) SR: 50.00
